name: Chamomile
description: Chamomile essential oil is known for its calming properties and is often used to promote relaxation and sleep.

name: Clary Sage
description: Clary Sage essential oil is beneficial for balancing hormones and reducing stress.

name: Lemon
description: Lemon essential oil is known for its uplifting and refreshing properties, commonly used for detoxification.

name: Rosemary
description: Rosemary essential oil helps improve concentration, memory, and is often used for mental clarity.

name: Ylang Ylang
description: Ylang Ylang oil is used for its sweet floral scent and is known to promote relaxation and emotional balance.
